attributes.action: Make All MP's Live in Dorms and Stop Claiming Expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British public is sick of the way MP's are allowed to claim expenses for dim-witted reasons. They don’t need 2 houses! Build dorms in Parliament and make the money grabbers live there.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
